summary: Japan creates an artificial black hole device to trap Godzilla forever, but a test of the device creates new foes for Godzilla, car-sized dragonflies called meganula and their queen, Megaguirus.
cast: Misato Tanaka|Shôsuke Tanihara|Masatô Ibu|Yuriko Hoshi|Toshiyuki Nagashima|Kôichi Ueda|Kôichi Yamadera|Yûsaku Yara|Kôji Katô|Tsutomu Kitagawa|Minoru Watanabe|Shigeo Katô|Masaaki Tezuka|Masanobu Katsumura|Motoko Nagino|Katsuo Nakamura|Rik Thomas
title: Gojira tai Megagirasu: Jî shômetsu sakusen
